select * from medibv115.d_duockp where id in (21,29,47)
select * from medibv115.btdkp_bv where makp in (21,29,47)
select * from medibv115.nhapkhoa where mabn='10820421'
select * from medibv115.xuatvien where mabn='10820421'


select * from medibv1150310.v_chidinh where mabn='10820421'

select * from medibv1150410.v_chidinh where mabn='10820421'


select * from medibv1150410.d_tienthuoc where mabn='10820421' and mabd in  (11161,12801)
update medibv1150410.d_tienthuoc set soluong=0 where mabn='10820421' and mabd =11161
select * from medibv115.d_dmbd where ma in ('DAYMT002','FLOW000')

12801
select * from medibv1150410.d_xtutrucll where mabn='10820421'

select * from medibv115.d_dmkho where id=18
